name: Scatter
description: Description for scatter data based on Hs-Tp.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: name for the scatter data as appear in SIMA.

attributes.name: hsUpperLimits
attributes.description: upper limits of the boundaries for each row in the scatter data.

attributes.name: tpUpperLimits
attributes.description: upper limits of the boundaries for each column in the scatter data.

attributes.name: countingPeriod
attributes.description: the duration which is used to count the occurrence of events.
